CONCLUSION: Violation of Art 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art 13;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of ORG , GPE region , GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of Donetsk Region against ORG . CARDINAL ( Шахта CARDINAL « Новогродівська » ) - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover salary arrears and other payments due to her late husband .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG міського суду PERSON області ) and awarded her CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( “ UAH ” ) . The judgment was sent for enforcement to the ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби PERSON міського управління юстиції ) .

CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant instituted proceedings in the Novogrodivskyy Town Court of GPE against the Novogrodivskyy Town Bailiffs ' Service for failure to enforce the judgment in her favour . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's claim , finding no fault had been committed by ORG . The court stated that ORG had acted properly in enforcing the judgment of CARDINAL DATE . However , by a number of decisions of ORG of GPE , ORG had been prohibited from selling the property of ORG , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against the company . On DATE ORG of GPE rejected the applicant 's appeal in cassation .

CARDINAL . In DATE , the applicant instituted another set of proceedings in the ORG of GPE against the Novogrodivskyy Town Bailiffs ' Service for failure to enforce the judgment in her favour . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's claim , for the same reasons as before . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of the first instance court of DATE . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's appeal in cassation .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE ORG was reorganised and became a structural subdivision of ORG . As the latter thereby became the debtor , in DATE the enforcement proceedings were transferred to ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби LOC міського управління юстиції ) .
CARDINAL . The judgment in the applicant 's favour was enforced by instalments , the last amount being paid on DATE .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of the GPE region against ORG claiming compensation for material and moral damage caused to her by the delay in the enforcement of the judgment in her favour . On DATE the court found against the applicant . On DATE the ORG upheld this judgment . The applicant appealed in cassation and the proceedings are still pending .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
